announcements.title: Interested in Joining CPC?
announcements.description: We consider the church an essential element of the gospel, so joining CPC as a member is a way to truly join the body of Christ, in all its blessings and with all its flaws! Before joining, you'll meet one-on-one with a pastor and then discuss how you've come to know Christ with the Shepherd Leaders. Contact Alexis Vano (admin@cpcnewhaven.org) to begin the process.

announcements.title: Fall Kick-off Lunch for College Students | 9/25
announcements.description: Hey undergrads! Join us for a fun and relaxed fellowship lunch at Commons, 168 Grove Street, from 12–1pm. Everyone's welcome—whether you're at Yale or not, living on or off campus. Come share a meal, meet new friends, and enjoy community together! Contact Pastor Jerry if you have questions jerry.ornelas@cpcnewhaven.org. If you'd like to keep up with other fellowship events please join the CPC College WhatsApp group.

announcements.title: Congregational Meeting | Sept. 28
announcements.description: Immediately after service: Vote on electing Pete Chuchta to the Office of Ruling Elder, vote to designate Rev. Preston Graham as Pastor Emeritus

announcements.title: Women's Social | Friday, Sept. 19
announcements.description: All women - visitors, regular attenders, members - are welcome to join us during Happy Hour at Bear's Smokehouse (470 James Street, New Haven) for fellowship and fun on Friday, Sept. 19 from 4:30pm-6:30pm (and later if you wish!). Two outdoor tables are reserved. The first beverage and some finger food will be provided! Feel free to bring a friend! If you have any questions, please contact Tanilla Brown (203-243-2153) or Patty Chuchta (203-676-4935).

announcements.title: College Game Night | This Sunday, Sept. 7
announcements.description: Undergrads, you're invited to Pastor Jerry's home tonight from 5pm-7pm for a classic game night and Zuppardi's Pizza! Stop by the welcome table to join the College WhatsApp group for details and future events - the address will be shared there.

announcements.title: CPC Churchwide Fall Retreat | October 10-12
announcements.description: @ Camp Wightman, Griswold, CT. Join us for a restful & invigorating weekend of fellowship in Christ! With Speakers Rob and Megan Hill. Details and registration available. Registration closes Sunday night 9/28! If your circumstances change between then and 10/10, please contact tylerarice@gmail.com for information about remaining availability.

announcements.title: Intro to Spirituality at CPC
announcements.description: New Class during Sunday Lunch in CPC Lecture Room | March 23-April 13 Have questions about CPC and why we do the things we do? Want to hear more about our spirituality and vision for the Christian life? Want to explore with others what it's like to experience Christ at CPC? These questions and more will be addressed in four 45 minute sessions starting March 23, and will include teaching, discussion, and open Q&A. All are welcome! Grab your lunch and join us in the lecture room!

announcements.title: Women's Discipleship Group | Megan Hill's devotional of contentment
announcements.description: Ladies -Are you interested in joining with other women to dig into your faith, to come alongside, to challenge and encourage one another in Christ? The evening Women's Discipleship Group will be working through Megan Hill's devotional on contentment for the next several months. We meet via Googlemeets the 1st and 3rd Mondays of each month at 7:30pm. For more information contact Lisa Graham lisahgraham44@gmail.com or Diane Miller auntie.diane@comcast.net

announcements.title: Spring Work Day | April 12
announcements.description: Join your church family as we take care of our grounds and building. This is a (surprisingly fun!) time of service and fellowship, as we do the church's version of Spring cleaning. This is the second of only two work days each year. There will be projects available for all skill levels!

announcements.title: Easter Fellowship Meals | Sign up now to Host or Join
announcements.description: Easter In-Home Fellowship Meals are returning, April 20 at various times and locations. Easter is an opportunity for us to celebrate the risen king as a family. What better way to do this than sitting around a table with family and friends giving thanks to Jesus for his wonderful gift of salvation? Sign up now to host or join others in the congregation for an Easter meal. All are welcome!

announcements.title: Easter Egg Hunt
announcements.description: Join us for an Easter Egg Hunt on April 19 at 11am outside on the lawn. All children are welcome to participate!

announcements.title: Young Adults Hike | May 3rd
announcements.description: Come enjoy fellowship in the outdoors with a group hike at "Bluff Head Preserve" in Guilford. We will do about a 1-mile loop, but there are options to go farther for those who prefer a longer hike. If you need a ride or want to caravan there, meet at CPC at 11:15 a.m. Otherwise we will meet at the parking lot at 12:00 p.m directly off Durham Road. Contact Josh S. at joshuatsanders@yahoo.com with any questions.

announcements.title: Good Friday Service | April 18th
announcements.description: Join us for our Good Friday Service on April 18 at 6:30pm. This is a special time of reflection and worship as we remember Christ's sacrifice. Bring a friend or family member to experience this meaningful service together.

announcements.title: Congregational Meeting | May 4th
announcements.description: All are welcome to join our annual spring family meeting, as we look back to what God has done in our midst this year, and consider how God is leading us into the future. We will discuss the survey results, among other topics.

announcements.title: The Mission Trip Team Needs Air Mattresses!
announcements.description: We leave for Atlantic City Aug. 2, and we need 8 air mattresses to take with us for our trip. As you may know, we’re partnering with a church - New City Fellowship - in an urban poor neighborhood of Atlantic City, NJ, doing mercy projects and Bible clubs with them. Please email admin@cpcnewhaven.org if you have an air mattress we can use for the week, or just bring them to church and leave them in the foyer closet.

announcements.title: Join us for Thursday Picnics @6PM in July
announcements.description: This is simply a time to gather together as a church family and enjoy a meal together! No program other than a shared meal. Feel free to bring friends! We'll gather on the front lawn, or the downstairs Fellowship Hall in case it rains.

announcements.title: CPC Moms Social | August 12, 6:00pm
announcements.description: Please join us at the home of Meg Bogue for savory and sweet apps and conversation! We will discuss the upcoming year. Those who are newer to CPC are especially welcome. Food sign up & more information, Estela Gierbolini (egierbo1@gmail.com) or Alicia Kebabian (akebabian@gmail.com)

announcements.title: Bridges of Hope (BOH) is Hiring
announcements.description: Bridges of Hope - an organization of churches serving New Haven together - is hiring a new Director for a new position combining the Mentoring Program and Executive Director roles. Please take a look at the job description. The application deadline will be August 31, so please pass along and ask people to apply today!

announcements.title: Mercy Day! | August 23

announcements.title: Women's Discipleship Group | Google Meet at 7:30pm
announcements.description: 1st and 3rd Mondays, New season starting Oct.6. Out of the love, comfort, and encouragement we find in Christ, we are then able to love, comfort, and encourage one another. Won't you consider joining us? We will be using Treasures of Encouragement by Sharon Betters. Contact Lisa Graham (lisahgraham44@gmail.com) or Diane Miller (auntiediane@att.net) for more information.

announcements.title: Moms Discipleship Group | CPC Parlor Room at 7:00pm
announcements.description: We are reading Walking With God in the Season of Motherhood, by Melissa Krueger. New people are most welcome and it is easy to join our discussion without having read prior chapters. Monday - 11/17, CPC Parlor at 7:00pm. For more information: Estela Gierbolini Norat, egierbo1@gmail.com or Meg Bogue, mhbogue@me.com

announcements.title: STARTS TONIGHT! | New Christian Leadership Training
announcements.description: We're beginning monthly training sessions on key topics such as: Bible Interpretation, Small Group Leadership, Missional Living & Hospitality, and Lay Counseling. This class builds on the Total Christ vision from Sunday School. It is especially for small group leaders and anyone aspiring to grow in their faith and service to the church. All are welcome. Starts this Friday, Sept. 26, 6:30-8:30pm, meal provided. Will continue Oct. 24 & Nov. 21. See website for readings.

announcements.title: Pastor Drop-In Office Hours | Starting September 12
announcements.description: Pastor Craig, Fridays 7:30am-10:30am | Other hours available upon request. Drop in for a casual time of discussion, Q&A, prayer, coffee, tea, really whatever you want to make it! Wondering what God is doing in a certain part of your life? Let's wonder together! Have a tricky situation at home or work? Let's discern best steps! Want to just chat about nothing in particular? Come on in! If you have a more private or formal need, you're always welcome to set up a separate time with Pastor Craig (craig.luekens@cpcnewhaven.org), or Pastor Jerry (jerry.ornelas@cpcnewhaven.org), but this is meant to be a space where anyone can drop in.

announcements.title: Enjoy Fellowship lunches? The Foodservice Team needs your help!
announcements.description: This ministry blesses our church by fostering stronger connections with one another over a shared meal. Please consider joining to help with setup and clean up. You will be scheduled to serve once every 4-6 weeks (more helpers = less often). Email Megan.Paek@yahoo.com to find out more.

announcements.title: Young Adults Park Cookout | Monday, September 1
announcements.description: Hey Young Adults! Come join us this Labor Day at Wharton Brook State Park (675 Washington Ave. North Haven) starting at 1pm for food, games and fellowship. Meet on the upper part by the picnic tables. Please sign up to bring something for the potluck. If you need a ride from the church, contact joshuatsanders@yahoo.com (951-813-6521).

announcements.title: This Sunday is welcome sunday
announcements.description: Join us this Sunday for our special welcome sunday celebration! We're excited to welcome new visitors and celebrate the start of the academic year together.

announcements.title: CPC Family Tailgate: Penn v. Yale | Saturday October 25
announcements.description: Please join us at 10:30 am at 56 Roger Road, New Haven (Preston & Lisa Graham's home) for fellowship and a tailgate meal hosted by the CPC Men's Ministry. The Yale Bulldogs will be hosting the Penn Quakers at the Yale Bowl, beginning at noon. The Bowl is a short walk from our location, and please bring your own drinks and a folding chair (soft drinks and food will be provided). This is a family tailgate, all are welcome! Tickets to the game may be purchased at the gate or purchase online. RSVP to Pat Clendenen at pat.clendenen@gmail.com. Go Bulldogs!

announcements.title: Church Journal
announcements.description: Calling all writers and artists: CPC is creating a church-wide journal this fall on the topic of "vocation." We'd love for you to contribute! Interested? Learn more here. Contact Seth Bollinger (sethbollinger15@gmail.com) with questions.

announcements.title: Parent's Book Pick
announcements.description: Worship is what we were made for—and that includes our kids! Teaching them to sit through and take part in worship isn't always easy, but it's such a beautiful journey as we watch them grow in the same faith we hold dear. God Made Me for Worship: Helping Children Understand Church by Jared Kennedy is a great resource to help little ones see what's really happening during a church service.

announcements.title: "Roots to the Reformed Tradition" | New Adult Sunday Studies Class begins next week!
announcements.description: In this 6-week class, led by Church history professor John Roney, we'll be walking through major movements in the spirituality and theology of our ancestors in the faith. How did they live as witnesses to Christ? What did they struggle through and find hope in? How can we learn from them today? All are welcome! Join us Sundays, 9:30 in the Fellowship Hall.

announcements.title: Thanksgiving Fellowship Meals | Sign Up Now as Host or Guest | Nov. 27
announcements.description: Staying local for Thanksgiving? Come celebrate with your brothers and sisters in Christ! As we've done in the past, we're coordinating Hosts & Guests to have a Thanksgiving meal together on Nov. 27. If you're interested, please email admin@cpcnewhaven.org or fill out the form here.

announcements.title: College Game Night | This Sunday, 5-7 PM
announcements.description: Hey College Students! We've got another Game Night happening this Sunday from 5–7 PM here at CPC in the Fellowship Hall! Bring a friend (or two!)—everyone's welcome. If you've got a favorite game, feel free to bring it along for us to enjoy together. We'll have refreshments provided!

announcements.title: Save-The-Date! | CPC Christmas Drama and Nativity | Saturday December 13
announcements.description: Come join us for a celebration of Christmas on Saturday the 13th of December! There will be Christmas Carols, a dramatic retelling of Old Testament Prophecies, and an interactive Nativity for children to take part in. We really encourage you to invite friends with young families and those who may not regularly attend CPC for a fun and lighthearted celebration. The celebration will be in the afternoon starting either at 4:00 or 5:00 pm with a pot-luck style reception after that. Keep an eye out for more information about the event, as well as opportunities to volunteer. Mark your calendars!

announcements.title: Reminder about Mercy Fund for Members and Regular Attenders
announcements.description: As one body of Christ, we want to share our lives together, which includes our financial needs. Please don't be shy in asking for help. Contact Kaitlyn Jessee with any questions (kaijessee@gmail.com)

announcements.title: Volunteers Needed: Christmas Drama and Nativity
announcements.description:
We are looking for volunteers to contribute to our Christmas Drama and Nativity! There is a role for everyone. We are looking for help with:
  • Reading roles in the dramatic retelling and narration of Old Testament prophecies (~6 adults, 4–6 children with reading ability)
  • Welcoming and ushering
  • Prop making for the Nativity scene
  • Interactive children's Nativity (all children welcome)
Please fill in this Google form to sign up: Sign up here, use the QR code, or email Ellen at martin.ellenjane@gmail.com.

Signups for the pot-luck reception will be sent out closer to the event!
